start_game:
/sapper - start the game
/language - select a language
/top - Top players
send_all_start: Send all the message on start bot
bot_started_press_sapper: Bot is running 😉, write /sapper to start the game
you_lost:
You lose
write /sapper for a new game
you_win: You won hit /sapper to start a new game
bot_started_admin_mode_off: the Bot is running, the mode of administration off
game_started: The game has started, bombs - %d, flags - %d
take_level: Choose the difficulty of the game
open_flag: Click on any cell of the field
rules:
---------------------------------Game rules---------------------------------
At the beginning of the game, the player has closed square fields. Some of these fields hide mines, and some do not. The player's task is to determine under which field the mine is hidden and mark these fields. The player must also open those fields where there are no mines. If a player opens a field with a mine, he loses. If a player opens a field without a mine, a number appears indicating how many mines are in eight adjacent fields. Based on these numbers, the player must determine where the mines are located. The goal of the game is to find all the mines by opening fields in which there are no mines.
